text: Tiago Fernandes announced that fatigue and back pain forced him to give up playing the final match, which was scheduled for 19:30 against the Japanese Tatsuma Ito. Ito won this tournament. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Pernambuco Brasil Open Series - Singles
title: 2011 Pernambuco Brasil Open Series – Singles
